about_the_game:
The future is now. Create projects about innovative trends with futuristic transitions and backgrounds. Add animated stickers to user guides to make the information really clear. Enhance your videos with smart titles and unique music tracks.

In this set you’ll find:

  • 70 titles
  • 26 stickers
  • 22 backgrounds
  • 30 transitions
  • 12 audio files

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus 2021.
detailed_description:

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2021 - Video Editing Software

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Feel like a hacker or a computer genius when you use the cyberpunk backgrounds and futuristic titles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
